model.name: Separate the Numbers
model.php_template:
<?php

$handle = fopen ("php://stdin","r");
fscanf($handle,"%d",$q);
for($a0 = 0; $a0 < $q; $a0++){
    fscanf($handle,"%s",$s);
    // your code goes here
}

?>
model.haskell_template:
import Control.Applicative
import Control.Monad
import System.IO


main :: IO ()
main = do
    q_temp <- getLine
    let q = read q_temp :: Int
    forM_ [1..q] $ \a0  -> do
        s <- getLine
        -- your code goes here


getMultipleLines :: Int -> IO [String]

getMultipleLines n
    | n <= 0 = return []
    | otherwise = do          
        x <- getLine         
        xs <- getMultipleLines (n-1)    
        let ret = (x:xs)    
        return ret
model.preview: Determine if a numeric string can be broken into a sequence of increasing numbers.

        loop [a0 q]
        (when (> a0 0)

          (
            let [
              s (read-line)  
            ]
          )

        ; your code goes here
        (recur (- a0 1) ) )
      )

)
model.erlang_template:
-module(solution).
-export([main/0]).

main() ->

    { ok, [Q]} = io:fread("", "~d"),
    Q_list = lists:seq(1,Q),
    lists:foreach( fun(Q0) ->
            { ok, [S]} = io:fread("", "~s"),
            % your code goes here
    end,Q_list),
    true.

read_array(0,D) -> [];
read_array(N,D) -> 
	{ok, [X]} = io:fread("", D),
	[X | read_array(N-1,D)].

read_2darray(0,M,D) -> [];
read_2darray(N,M,D) ->
	Q=read_array(M,D),
	[Q | read_2darray(N-1,M,D)].
